seo.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy | Diviso
seo.description: Learn about Diviso's refund and cancellation policy. Information about subscriptions, credits, and digital features.

items.legal_name: Legal Name: Takamel Albinna Commercial Establishment

items.cancel: Subscriptions may be cancelled at any time.
items.no_refund: No refunds are issued for any used subscription period.

items.non_refundable: Credits and digital features are considered non-refundable digital services once used.
items.no_refund_after_add: Credits cannot be refunded once added to the user account.

technical_errors.title: 4. Technical Errors
technical_errors.content: In the event of a verified technical error resulting in an incorrect charge, the case will be reviewed and compensation may be provided if the error is confirmed.

tax_refunds.title: 5. Tax Refunds
tax_refunds.content: Any refunds (if applicable) will be processed in accordance with tax regulations applicable in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: For any inquiries related to refunds or cancellations, users may contact the official support channels available within the platform.
